title: When you leave lane as Blitz to ward...
body:
https://67.media.tumblr.com/7313e25c8ca69ca1f5273001f7b6aa79/tumblr_nx8fy2dX2C1uxvrrjo1_500.gif

Only to return and find your ADC having died to a four man gank

http://i.imgur.com/X6sJk9q.gifv

replies.body:
When you pull the Fed Sion away from your team
https://g.redditmedia.com/tXEdxPLSrZvL4YFRsA0dNutupsnUSwA5rNo6yWOaleE.gif?w=320&s=953d6979f75e6bffc3819c8330661762

...Jesus Christ that is more heroic than Reinhardt going off the edge with it. 

I love Roadhog.

15 hours and counting on Roadhog =P

I love being a self-sustained tank with the ability to one-shot squishies.

I've got 9 hours on him and Reinhardt. Reinhardt got harder to play as I played more due to people knowing to get out of the way. Roadhog I started playing because he's the only tank that doesn't need a healer and shuts people down. 

Some days it feels like everyone counters him though.
Then there's those times where it feels like you can't miss, and every hook spells death for another slippery Tracer.
Yes. So much yes. My hook lands rarely drop below 50% now.

Personal best is 78%, but I think my average is still 53%? Partially explained by my attempts to blow people's minds by throwing it BEFORE they come out from around the corner, and then they fail to cooperate. But still. Consistency has definitely improved over time.
To be honest I was looking for that one and found this instead
If he missed that hook...

"GGereported."
"Guys, our Roaddog is shitting the bed with his hooks, Jesus."
In that position, Roadhog was pretty much screwed already. May as well go for the (brilliantly executed) Hail Mary.
Someone explain to me what is happening in the gif!!
roadhog committed suicide but managed to drag the enemy with him
even better, he dragged the D.Va ult nuke with him

The mech-suit (containing the hero D. Va) partially fell into the hole, then flew straight upward out of it while activating the suit's Self-Destruct (which is a delayed one-hit-kill to any enemy in line-of-sight in the large blast radius) and ejecting to safety.

Roadhog saw it happening, and heroically leaped down the hole, tossing his Chain Hook at the soon-to-be-exploded mech (not at D. Va herself, you can see her falling to ground nearby), and yanking it down the hole after him, containing the explosion and likely saving 2 or more of his teammates from near-certain death.
"How to save a life ~I>"

Dude come on,  I can only cry so much.

Heard Iron Giant was getting a sequel...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wBNy6CPtV8g
What, why? The story was entirely complete, I can't imagine where it would go.

There was nothing complete about the ending of the movie.

We still have no idea where IG came from, If Hogatrh put him back together because his components we're still moving or what happened to the family after.
Iron Giant was putting himself back together, since you saw the screw rolling away over towards his slowly reactivating boy.
Yeah that clear has alot of setup for a sequel. Example, how would Hogarth keep that a secret? Judging from how it went last time there'd be a serous story about the situation.

After reading below what actually happened in that .gif (I too was just composing a post asking the same thing): "Here's to you, kid".

The ultimate sacrifice - you can easily tell when someone is used to playing support by the moves they make. Even when not playing a support champion.
Though sometimes, it's better described as "a last act of defiance". In which case: DRAA..._whoops, wrong phrase - my bad_; "FREEEDOOOOOMM!!"
[_Or just the old (...) _](https://youtu.be/_DimZ1upYMU?t=2)

If I ever decide to jump on the Overwatch train, my first game would likely be as the Swiss miss. Healers, regardless of game, is really my forte.
Roadhog the "selfish tank" sacrificing himself for others...the feels

Holy shit, that's beautiful.

Man, I should really get back to playing Overwatch again.
Okay, that is now what I aspire to be when I play Roadhog. I drop people down that well all the time, but I've never heroically sacrificed myself like that.
Should make a post about the gutting of taliyah, since people only seem to care when you make a post about a champion thrown in the dumpster.
Do you want some content with your salt?

i have no salt, it was a genuine request.
no one cares about champions with sub 2% playrates, but metal makes them with his dank memes.

y u tryna throw shade fam?

Hmm..
I gotta play a bit of Taliyah first then

She's annoying, spammy, and fucks over dashers.

You'll love her.

ik I do, if I weren't completely bronze at all times I'd play her more.

that and karthus is just such a beast against the fools I play against (If i remember to use my item actives to live a little longer)
Karthus is easily my favorite mage.

she is fun and feels genuinely rewarding since she is 100% skillshots.
but god is her farm/midgame miserable.

i just wall rode to dragon in my last game,  they had 5 there but jax (jungle) was low hp. i q'd kallista killed her ignited jax stole dragon with e and flashed over my wall and ran away LOL
I told y'all those bush brows would be the death of her. The sand raiders weren't wearing those masks for style points.

When you decide to use your pro Blitz skills to get revenge for your ADC.

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-SSX1ejFIqcY/UkrqN3CArkI/AAAAAAAABaE/SWOpxSUoisc/s1600/tumblr_mrngjcHeTs1r0b2hgo1_400.gif

http://share.gifyoutube.com/yxodpP.gif
Why does the enemy team have four tanks?

Tank meta, silly. 

... What, you haven't heard of tank Jhin? Their only squishy is that van there -- probably Syndra or Zed.
Where can I play in this Tank Meta? I'd like to meet more of my people.
http://ci.memecdn.com/928/1104928.jpg

I'd also like to use that second gif as:

When you play Ivern and see people killing camps.
So relatable it hurts
Dem mobility boots blitzcranks tho <3

> \*Implication that supports actually feel some level of pity when their adc solo dives for the millionth time and shockingly dies after you warned them not to... for the millionth time.\*

I call BS.
but...but... isn't blitz the one who usually does that to the enemy adc when his support leaves to ward or whatever
I LOVE THE IRON GIANT <33333
http://i.imgur.com/GiapkPg.gif?noredirect

i give you +1 for Having the classic movie of 1999 for your post.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
gtfo with the feels... I've already had my daily dose...
